statements: DELETE FROM trains_safety_compliance_records WHERE inspection_date < '2021-10-15' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM trains WHERE train_name = 'Express Train';
DELETE FROM infrastructure WHERE infra_type = 'Tunnel' AND compliance_status = FALSE
DELETE FROM InfrastructureRecords WHERE inspection_location = 'Station A' AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM infrastructure WHERE infra_name = 'Bridge 1' AND location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM TrainSafetyRecords WHERE violation_type = 'Hazardous Materials' AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
